mapper.select: select * from ( select row_number() over (order by avglike desc) as rn , title, price, avglike, no, userid, img, video, contents, qty, regdate, hits, tag, location, categoryno from product_table ) where rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn < #{endIndex}+1

select * from ( select row_number() over (order by regdate desc) as rn , title, price, avglike, no, userid, img, video, contents, qty, regdate, hits, tag, location, categoryno from product_table ) where rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn < #{endIndex}+1

select * from ( select row_number() over (order by hits desc) as rn , title, price, avglike, no, userid, img, video, contents, qty, regdate, hits, tag, location, categoryno from product_table ) where rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn < #{endIndex}+1

select count(*) from (select row_number () over (order by regdate desc) rn, title, no, userid, img, contents, price, qty, hits, avglike, tag,categoryno from product_table )
where categoryno = #{categoryNo}
select name from category_table where no = #{value}

select p.no, p.title, p.userid, p.img, p.video, p.contents, p.price, p.qty, p.regdate, p.avglike, p.hits, p.tag, p.categoryno as "category.no", p.location as "location.no", c.bno as "category.bno", c.name
from (select row_number () over (order by regdate desc) rn, no, title, userid, img, video, contents, price, qty, regdate, avglike, hits, tag, categoryno, location from product_table where categoryno = #{categoryNo} ) p , Category_table c where p.categoryno = c.no and rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn <= #{endIndex}
